Text: Thank you so much for this!!! It's absolutely soulful and sexy.  I'm one of the original House Music dancer back in the day when it was mixed at someone's "house" in the basement with black lights, multiple turn tables and sweaty people who couldn't stop dancing til it was over.  I'm so proud to see that this music has now become international and that so many people has kept it so soulful and energized.  I had the best workout ever this morning listening to your mix.  I can't thank you enough!!!!
